title: Black Friday Came Early—15 Unreal Beauty Items I'm Not Buying Full Price
excerpt: Black Friday came early and our editors are prepared with all of their top picks from Walmart. Read this story to see our favorite on-sale beauty items.
text: (Image credit: @aniyahmorinia)Every year, it seems like the Black Friday deals start earlier and earlier—but I'm not mad at it. I've been training for this season all year. I've practically memorized the interfaces of every retail site I frequent, allowing me to quickly and easily shop for everything I predict will sell out. One site I always keep an eye on, especially during this time of year, is Walmart. Not only does it offer nearly every brand and item you could think of, but the deals are unreal. I combed through thousands of products to find the best sale items you'd be lucky to add to your cart. Below you'll find all my favorites, including hair and skincare tools, designer fragrances, and so much more.P.S. Act fast—this sale lasts from November 25 to December 2. Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia Eau de Parfum Spray Nexpure Nexpure Facial Cleansing Brush Sol De Janeiro Delicia Drench Body Butter Peter Thomas Roth Pumpkin Enzyme Mask Shark Speedstyle Rapidgloss Finisher and High-Velocity Dryer for Straight and Wavy Hair, Hd331 Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask Olaplex No 6 Bond Smoother Leave in Styling Treatment The Beachwaver Co. B-Series 1.25" Rotating Curling Iron Drunk Elephant A-Gloei Maretinol Oil Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray Dossier Floral Lavender Eau De Parfum Hero All Stars Acne Patch Holiday Kit OPI Wicked Nail Polish Mini Mani Gift Set Skin Gym IceCool Ice Roller Aniyah Morinia is an NYC-based associate beauty and fashion editor at Who What Wear. She has worked in fashion media since 2018 and joined WWW's branded content team, where she not only writes for some of her favorite brands but also creates content for them. Aniyah will find any excuse to get a photo of her outfit and absolutely loves taking photos. She graduated from the University of Florida in 2020 with a bachlor's degree in public relations and started post-grad life freelancing for EveryStylishGirl, Riot Swim, and Baby Tress. Since starting at Who What Wear, Aniyah has developed a passion for hosting livestreams, working red carpets, and creating TikToks in addition to writing fashion and beauty stories. When Aniyah's not writing or creating content, you can find her exploring Brooklyn and eating her way through the city. She'll never pass up the opportunity to uncover an NYC hidden gem or mix and mingle with her friends (all while swapping holy-grail products, of course).
html:
Every year, it seems like the Black Friday deals start earlier and earlier—but I'm not mad at it. I've been training for this season all year. I've practically memorized the interfaces of every retail site I frequent, allowing me to quickly and easily shop for everything I predict will sell out. One site I always keep an eye on, especially during this time of year, is Walmart. Not only does it offer nearly every brand and item you could think of, but the deals are unreal. I combed through thousands of products to find the best sale items you'd be lucky to add to your cart. Below you'll find all my favorites, including hair and skincare tools, designer fragrances, and so much more.

P.S. Act fast—this sale lasts from November 25 to December 2.

Gucci

Flora Gorgeous Gardenia Eau de Parfum Spray

Nexpure

Nexpure Facial Cleansing Brush

Sol De Janeiro

Delicia Drench Body Butter

Peter Thomas Roth

Pumpkin Enzyme Mask

Dossier

Hero

All Stars Acne Patch Holiday Kit

OPI

Wicked Nail Polish Mini Mani Gift Set

Skin Gym

IceCool Ice Roller

Aniyah Morinia is an NYC-based associate beauty and fashion editor at Who What Wear. She has worked in fashion media since 2018 and joined WWW's branded content team, where she not only writes for some of her favorite brands but also creates content for them. Aniyah will find any excuse to get a photo of her outfit and absolutely loves taking photos. She graduated from the University of Florida in 2020 with a bachlor's degree in public relations and started post-grad life freelancing for EveryStylishGirl, Riot Swim, and Baby Tress. Since starting at Who What Wear, Aniyah has developed a passion for hosting livestreams, working red carpets, and creating TikToks in addition to writing fashion and beauty stories. When Aniyah's not writing or creating content, you can find her exploring Brooklyn and eating her way through the city. She'll never pass up the opportunity to uncover an NYC hidden gem or mix and mingle with her friends (all while swapping holy-grail products, of course).
